---
title: CSS图片手风琴伸缩效果
date: 2021-02-24 17:59:58
permalink: /pages/ea0390/
categories:
  - 前端
  - CSS
tags:
  - 
---
鼠标进入图片时当前图片展开，其它图片收缩，同时只有一个图片展开。效果如下：
::: center
![手风琴](https://lhost.oss-cn-chengdu.aliyuncs.com/blog/20240223143754.png)
:::


代码如下：

```html
<template>
	<div class="wrapper">
		<div class="list">
			<div class="item">
				<img src="https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3be05963f5f3753a8cb75b6692154d4a_720w.jpg?source=172ae18b.jpg" alt="bg2" class="image">
			</div>
			<div class="item">
				<img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="bg1" class="image">
			</div>
			<div class="item">
				<img src="https://img95.699pic.com/photo/50046/5562.jpg_wh300.jpg" alt="bg2" class="image">
			</div>
			<div class="item">
				<img src="https://img95.699pic.com/photo/50136/1351.jpg_wh300.jpg" alt="bg1" class="image">
			</div>
			<div class="item">
				<img src="https://img95.699pic.com/photo/50034/0209.jpg_wh300.jpg" alt="bg2" class="image">
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</template>

<script>
	export default {
		
	}
</script>

<style scoped lang="scss">
	.wrapper {
		width: 800px;
		height: 300px;
		.list {
      display: flex;
			height: 100%;
			overflow: hidden;
			// 该hover必须在item的hover前面，先触发
			// &:hover {
			// 	.item {
			// 		width: 50px;
			// 	}
			// }
			// item的hover需在后，后触发
			.item {
				display: inline-block;
        margin: 0 2px;
				overflow: hidden;
        width: 160px;
				height: 100%;
				transition: width .3s;
				
				.image {
					height: 100%;
				}
				
				&:hover {
					width: 600px;
				}
			}
		}
	}
</style>

```
